thread.title_full: Bobby Bowden Hitting the Links For Local FCAs

title: Bobby Bowden Hitting the Links For Local FCAs
text: Tuesday, October 20 2015, 07:02 AM EDT Bobby Bowden Hitting the Links For Local FCAs The former Florida State Football coach helped raise money for the Fellowship of Christain Athletes on Monday. Bobby Bowden was in Cleveland this morning to play a game of golf with some area schools.Bowden coached the Seminoles for 34 years.He led them to 28 consecutive bowl games and two national championships.He has stayed heavily involved in the Fellowship of Christian Athletes or FCA.But when Bowden was asked about his golf game, he said this: "I'm not a very good golfer. I hope these people don't expect me to shoot lights out. Number one, I play from the red tees, that's as close as I can get and from there, that's all I can do to break 90."
